duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform administration and analysis of WGU’s Compensation programs
Partner with Talent & Hiring leaders to develop compensation offers
Conduct job description and market reviews
Recommend, conduct, and participate in salary surveys
Assure that all organization compensation programs are consistently administered in compliance with company policies and government regulations

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
At least 5 years of Compensation specific experience
